name: identityGovernance_lifecycleWorkflows_UpdateCustomTaskExtensions
description: Update the navigation property customTaskExtensions in identityGovernance

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**authenticationConfiguration**: Configuration for securing the API call to the logic app. For example, using OAuth client credentials flow.

**clientConfiguration**: HTTP connection settings that define how long Azure AD can wait for a connection to a logic app, how many times you can retry a timed-out connection and the exception scenarios when retries are allowed.
**displayName**: Display name for the customCalloutExtension object.
**endpointConfiguration**: The type and details for configuring the endpoint to call the logic app's workflow.
**callbackConfiguration**: The callback configuration for a custom extension.
**createdBy**: The unique identifier of the Azure AD user that created the custom task extension.Supports $filter(eq, ne) and $expand.
**createdDateTime**: When the custom task extension was created.Supports $filter(lt, le, gt, ge, eq, ne) and $orderby.
**lastModifiedBy**: The unique identifier of the Azure AD user that modified the custom task extension last.Supports $filter(eq, ne) and $expand.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: When the custom extension was last modified.Supports $filter(lt, le, gt, ge, eq, ne) and $orderby.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
